textBox.richText: Alli brought out the dress for WP opening...you can barely make out her, me, and Max with all the snow coming down!!! Alas, only Parkway, Porcupine, and Bobcat for opening day, but they were working on Sale. Checking around, Loveland is still just Chair 1, but Copper planned on opening the Flyer today, with directed skiing down CDL and Mine Dump.
